headline: Coinbase Hit With Double Downgrade Ahead Of Tough Earnings Test
summary: Analysts downgrade, cut price targets for Coinbase stock ahead of Q4 results as bitcoin, cryptos fall into bear market territory.

headline: MCH moves to ’tactical sell’ on Coinbase stock, sees 20% downside risk
summary: Investing.com -- Monness, Crespi, Hardt analyst Gus Gala cut Coinbase to a tactical Sell on Thursday, warning that Street estimates for 2026 and 2027 remain too high and that the crypto exchange faces several more quarters of softness.

(NASDAQ:COIN) and Crypto ISAC announced an expanded integration. headline: Coinbase Global (COIN) Is Down 9.1% After ARK Trims Stake And Regulatory Jitters - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent days, Coinbase Global has faced a mix of pressures ahead of its now‑imminent Q4 2025 earnings release, including regulatory scrutiny over event contracts in Nevada, technical issues affecting Algorand transfers, and cautious commentary from market personalities and regulators. At the same time, institutional investors such as ARK Invest have trimmed positions while leveraged products linked to Coinbase have suffered very large drawdowns, underscoring how sentiment shifts and...

headline: JPMorgan Cuts PT on Coinbase Global (COIN) to $290 From $399
summary: Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the most oversold NASDAQ stocks to invest in. JPMorgan cut the price target on Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) to $290 from $399 on February 10, reaffirming an Overweight rating on the shares ahead of the fiscal Q4 report. Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) also received a rating update from […]

headline: Review & Preview: Powell’s Vindication
summary: REVIEW PREVIEW NEWSLETTER Round Trip. The S&P 500 made an early break for 7,000 but ended the day back where it started. The market benchmark was unchanged after rallying as high as 6,993.48. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 67 points, or 0.
